event.title: The FSFE assembly at the Chaos Communication Congress 35C3 in Leipzig, Germany

body.p: As in previous years, the FSFE will be present with an assembly during the Chaos Communication Congress from December 27 to 30 in Leipzig, Germany. The FSFE assembly will be part of the cluster "about:freedom" and running its own track. In this track the we have Susanne speaking about her self-made "smartphone" (video), Katharina Nocun about data collecting Amazon (video) and Erik Albers about the best of Fdroid (video).

footer.p: FSFE booth during 35C3, the 35th Chaos Communication Congress
